summary: This document is an email chain from August 2019 discussing technical issues with the recording capabilities of a camera system at a facility, likely related to an FBI investigation. The FBI is retrieving previous recordings, which will take the system offline for 8-10 days, prompting discussions about backup recording options.

persons.name: NER Facl Manager
persons.context: The sender of the initial email in the chain, informing others that the FBI is retrieving recordings from the facility's camera system and inquiring about backup recording options.

events.title: FBI Retrieval of Facility Recordings
events.description: The FBI is retrieving previous recordings from a camera system at a facility, causing the recording capabilities to be offline for 8-10 days during the data retrieval process.

keyFacts: The FBI is actively retrieving recordings from a camera system at a facility, indicating an ongoing investigation.
The recording system will be offline for 8-10 days during the FBI's data retrieval process.
Facility staff are discussing contingency plans, including remote recording or emergency equipment replacement, to maintain surveillance capabilities.
